directions: In a large bowl, combine pumpkin puree, pudding mix, pumpkin pie spice and evaporated milk. Mix well. Fold in 1 cup of the whipped topping. Pour filling into pie shell. Chill for 2 hours, or until set.
Spread remaining 1/2 cup whipped topping over filling.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix
1 1/2 cups lite frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Pumpkin Chiffon Pie IV
